title: Bontexkenzy
author: Bontexkenzy
content: Well,as a Nigerian, without any doubt,my best president in Nigeria is late umoru Musa yaradua.though he didn't last long, but his policies where good eg(the seven point agenda)

comments.author: melissa11
comments.body: Quote from: Bontexkenzy on June 28, 2022, 06:58:33 PMWell,as a Nigerian, without any doubt,my best president in Nigeria is late umoru Musa yaradua.though he didn't last long, but his policies where good eg(the seven point agenda)It is very good and commendable that you are proud of your president. I live in Ukraine, we are not having the best times now, but our President Volodymyr Zelensky is steadfastly enduring all tests. I am proud of our strong president, our independent country.

comments.author: VKcams.com
comments.body: Quote from: melissa11 on June 29, 2022, 06:51:42 AMI am proud of our strong president, our independent country.You'd have to look for such an idiot. How many parties has he banned?And how many TV channels did he shut down?

comments.author: DeathAngel
comments.body: I don’t know who is the best leader of the UK but I can tell you 100% who is not the best leader & that is the man in charge right now, Boris Johnson. The guy has been an unmitigated disaster since day one.

comments.author: 81coin
comments.body: Quote from: DeathAngel on June 30, 2022, 06:12:05 PMI don’t know who is the best leader of the UK but I can tell you 100% who is not the best leader & that is the man in charge right now, Boris Johnson. The guy has been an unmitigated disaster since day one.yeah, it's much easier to say the worst president, not the best

comments.author: ammodotcom
comments.body: As an American, definitely some kind of senile career criminal who can only get elected with the collective efforts of every government agency and mainstream news outlet.
